textBox.richText: We weren’t expecting any new snow, but woke up to 4”. At that point, I had to run downstairs and prep the S7s. :) Spent the morning with Alli...headed up to Pano. Did a couple runs up there, but the snow was in a weird state, so we bailed fairly quickly. Trestle was open, and was glorious! Hadn’t been tracked out, so the face was more similar to the headwalls than giant moguls with rocks. Fun! Did a run through the newly opened Boiler...good conditions there too. After lunch, headed over to Pioneer (good snow), and after Alli bailed, headed back to the Jane side for some more runs. Good day!
